sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import ReactApexChart from "react-apexcharts"; import { chartData } from './ChartData' export default function Swap() { const [chainModal, setChainModal] = useState(false); const [name, setname] = useState('Maximum Return'); const [walletModal, setWalletModal] = useState(false); const [MoreInfo, setMoreInfo] = useState(true); const [currency1, setCurrency1] = useState('ETH'); const [currency2, setCurrency2] = useState('USDT'); const [slippageaction, setSlippageaction] = useState(false) const [selectedSlippage, setSelectedSlippage] = useState('0.5%'); const[currency1Icon,setCurrency1Icon]=useState('ethereum_header.png'); const[currency2Icon,setCurrency2Icon]=useState('bnb.png'); const series = [ { data: chartData, }, ]; const SwapCurrency = () => { const temp = currency1; setCurrency1(currency2); setCurrency2(temp); const iconTemp=currency1Icon; setCurrency1Icon(currency2Icon); setCurrency2Icon(iconTemp) } return (
Instantly buy or sell tokens at superior prices
0
~$1,846
Est. Output
0
{/*
1847.925662
*/}
~$1,846
{ slippageaction ?
{ setSelectedSlippage(e.target.value + '%') }} type="text" placeholder='Custome' />
: null }
{ MoreInfo ? <>
Alfreds Futterkiste Maria Anders
Centro comercial Moctezuma Francisco Chang
Ernst Handel Roland Mendel
Island Trading
: null }
{/* Chart Section */}
{ setChainModal(false) }} fullscreen={false} centered >
ETH DAI DAI DAI DAI
{ setWalletModal(false) }} fullscreen={false} centered >

Connect Your Wallet

) }
